scripts.client-build: cd client && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.server-build: cd server && npm ci --dev && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm run client-build && npm run server-build && mv ./client/build ./server/dist
scripts.start: npm run client-build && cd server && npm run start
scripts.test:server: cd server && npm run build && nodemon ./dist/app.js && cd ../
scripts.all: npm run remove && npm run heroku-prebuild && npm run start
